ComicInfo.Summary:
Spawn's look changes a bit, for now the gash in his face has been repaired with a grimy shoelace. Meanwhile Terry is under investigation at the office, however from what they've seen so far he's essentially clean, but that won't stop Jason Wynn.
Spawn learns more about his friend, Bobby, and is inspired to protect the homeless, which he is given an oppurtunity, when some Nazi-skinhead starts attacking homeless, spawn shows up, and gives him a message for his boss, Tony Twist.
But Tony has a message of his own, for an old friend is comming back to visit.
ComicInfo.Teams: Federal Bureau of Investigation,New York Police Department,Central Intelligence Agency,Hellspawn
ComicInfo.Title: The Hunt Part 1
